tvam hi pfzWa gatAm kftvA sam@@ tar@@ izyAmi sAgaram SaktiH asti hi me voQum lankAm api sarAvaRAm
aham prasravaR@@ asT@@ Aya rAGavAya adya mETili prApayizyAmi SakrAya havyam hutam iva analaH
drakzyasi adya eva vEdehi rAGavam saha lakzmaRam vyavasAya samAyuktam vizRum dEtya vaDe yaTA
tvat darSana kfta utsAham ASram@@ asTam mahAbalam puraMdaram iva AsInam nAga rAjasya mUrDani
pfzWam Aroha me devi mA vi@@ kAn@@ kzasva SoBane yogam anvicCa rAmeRa SaSa ankena iva rohiRI
kaTayanti iva candreRa sUryeRa iva suvarcalA mat pfzWam aDiruhya tvam tara AkASa mahAarRavam
na hi me samprayA@@ tasya tvAm ito nay@@ ato ang@@ ane anugantum gatim SaktAH sarve lankA nivAsinaH
yaTA eva aham iha prAptaH taTEva aham asaMSayam yAsyAmi paSya vEdehi tvAm udyamya vihAyasam
mETilI tu hari SrezW@@ At SrutvA vacanam adButam harza vismita sarva angI hanUmantam aTa abravIt
hanUman dUram aD@@ vanam kaTam mAm voQum icCasi tat eva Kalu te manye kapitvam hari yUTapa
kaTam vA alpa SarIr@@ aH tvam mAm ito netum icCasi sakASam mAnava indrasya BartuH me plavaga fzaBa
sItAyA vacanam SrutvA hanUmAn mAruta AtmajaH cintayAmAsa lakzmIvAn navam pari@@ Bavam kftam
na me jAnAti sattvam vA praBAvam vA asita IkzaRA tasmAt paSyatu vEdehI yat rUpam mama kAmataH
iti saMcintya hanumAn tadA plavaga sattamaH darSayAmAsa vEdehyAH svarUpam ari mardanaH
sa tasmAt pAdapAt DImAn Aplutya plavaga fzaBaH tato varDitum AreBe sItA pratyaya kAraRAt
meru mand@@ Ara samkASo baBO dIpta anala praBaH agrato vyavat@@ asTe ca sItAyA vAnara fzaBaH
hariH parvata samkASaH tAmra vaktro mahAbalaH vajra damzwra naKo BImo vEdehIm idam abravIt
saparvata vana ud@@ deS@@ Am sAwwa prAkAra toraRAm lankAm imAm san@@ aTAm vA nay@@ itum SaktiH asti me
tat avasTApya tAm budDiH alam devi vi@@ kAnkzayA viSok@@ am kuru vEdehi rAGavam saha lakzmaRam
tam dfzwvA acala samkASam uvAca janaka AtmajA padma patra viSAla akzI mArutasya Orasam sutam
tava sattvam balam cEva vijAnAmi mahAkape vAyoH iva gatim ca api tejaH ca agniH iva adButam
prAkfto anyaH kaTam ca imAm BUmim Agantum arhati udaDeH aprameyasya pAram vAnara pumgava
jAnAmi gamane Saktim nayane ca api te mama avaSyam sAm@@ praDArya ASu kArya sidDiH iha AtmanaH

patitA sAgare ca aham timi nakra Jaza Akule Bayeyam ASu vivaSA yAd@@ asAm annam uttamam
na ca Sakz@@ ye tvayA sArDam gantum Satru vinAS@@ ana kalat@@ ra@@ vati saMdehaH tvayi api syAt asaMSayam

tEH tvam parivftaH SUrEH SUlam ud@@ gara pARiBiH BaveH tvam saMSayam prApto mayA vIra kalat@@ ravAn
sAyuD@@ A bahavo vyomni rAkzasAH tvam nirAyuD@@ aH kaTam Sakz@@ yasi sam@@ yAtum mAm cEva parirakzitum
yuDyamAnasya rakzoBiH tataH tEH krUra karmaBiH prapateyam hi te pfzW@@ at Baya ArtA kapi sattama
aTa rakzAMsi BImAni mahAnti balavanti ca kaTaMcit sAmparA@@ ye tvAm jay@@ eyuH kapi sattama
aTavA yuDyamAnasya pateyam vi@@ muKasya te patitAm ca gfhItvA mAm nay@@ eyuH pApa rAkzasAH

kAmam tvam api paryApto nihantum sarva rAkzasAn rAGavasya yaSo hI@@ yet tvayA Sast@@ EH tu rAkzasEH
aTavA AdAya rakzAMsi nyas@@ yeyuH samvfte hi mAm yatra te na aBijAnI@@ yuH harayo na api rAGavaH

mayi jIvitam Ayattam rAGavasya mahAtmanaH BrAtffRAm ca mahAbAho tava rAja kulasya ca
tO nirASO mat arTe tu Soka samtApa karSitO saha sarva fkza hariBiH tyakz@@ yataH prARa samgraham
BartuH Baktim puraH kftya rAmAt anyasya vAnara na aham sprazwum padA gAtram icCeyam vAnara uttama

SrutA hi dfzwAH ca mayA parAkramA mahAtmanaH tasya raRa avamard@@ inaH na deva ganDarva Bujamga rAkzasA Bavanti rAmeRa samA hi samyuge
samIkzya tam samyati citra kArmukam mahAbalam vAsava tulya vikramam salakzmaRam ko vizah@@ eta rAGavam huta aSanam dIptam iva anila Iritam

deva ganDarva BUtAnAm fzIRAm ca mahAtmanAm ko ayam evam mahAvIryaH tvAm virUpAm cakAra ha

iti BrAtur vacaH SrutvA krudDasya ca viSezataH tataH SUrpaRaKA vAkyam sabAzpam idam abravIt

so aham guru vacaH kurvan pfTivyAm na vase niSAm tadA praBfti kAkutsTa kftA me kASyapasya ha
tam imAm mat gatim vIra hantum na arhasi rAGava mano javam gamizyAmi mahendram parvata uttamam

akzay@@ yam maDu hantAram jAnAmi tvAm sur@@ eSvaram Danuzo asya parAmarS@@ At svasti te astu paraMtapa
ete sura gaRAH sarve nirIkzante samAgatAH tvAm apratima karmARam apratidvandvam Ahave
na ca iyam tava kAkutsTa vrIqA Bavitum arhati tvayA trElokya nATena yat aham vimuKI kftaH

taTA bruvati rAme tu jAmadagn@@ ye pratApavAn rAmo dASaraTiH SrImAn cikzepa Saram uttamam
sa hatAn dfSya rAmeRa svAn lokAn tapasA ArjitAn jAmadagnyo jagAma ASu mahendram parvatottamam
tato vi timi@@ rAH sarvA diSA ca upadiS@@ aH taTA surAH sa fzi gaRAH rAmam praSaSaMsuH ud@@ AyuDam
rAmam dASaraTim rAmo jAmadagnyaH praSasya ca tataH pradakziRI kftya jagAma Atma gatim praBuH

etat tu vacanam SrutvA lakzmaRasya mahAtmanaH uvAca rAmam kOsalyA rudantI Soka lAlasA

jAnIze tvam janasTAne BrAtA yatra Karo mama dUzaRaH ca mahAbAhuH svasA SUrpaRaKA ca me triSirAH ca mahAtejA rAkzasaH piSita aSanaH anye ca bahavaH SUrA labDa lakz@@ A niSAcarAH vasanti mat ni@@ yogena aDivAsam ca rAkzasaH bAD@@ amAnA mahAraRye munIn ye Darma cAriRaH
